sense.def:
A phase
je stopnja v dogajanju ali poteku nečesa.

seg.quote: We have moved into a new phase in European history.
...cameras set to record every phase of the eclipse.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
phases a change over a period of time
, poskrbi, da sprememba poteka v več stopnjah.

seg.quote: The reduction in nuclear weapons would be phased over ten years.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
phases in something new
, nekaj novega uvaja v več stopnjah.

seg.quote: ...a plan to phase in equal pay.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
phases something out
, postopno neha tisto uporabljati.

seg.quote: This type of weapon was now being finally phased out.
